\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
Generic socket address. 

This is a wrapper around {\ttfamily sockaddr\+\_\+storage} which can hold any family address. This should have enough memory to contain any address struct for the system on which it is compiled.

Gets the size of the address. 

\begin{DoxyReturn}{Returns}
The size of the address. This is the number of bytes that are a valid part of the address. 
\end{DoxyReturn}
